Reviews.Title: Best compact camera
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: It's the most amazing compact camera that fits in the palm of your hand with a 20x wide angle optical zoom for the price that's irresistible. The best deal you can have for an incredible camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Larry Puetz
Reviews.Content: Takes outstanding pictures. A little hard to focus on the end of the zoom but a great product. Well worth it

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: S. cooper
Reviews.Content: Only dislike is no viewer, must use screen only to view and glare fron outside makes it hard to see subject sometimes.It was a gift to my husband and he really is enjoying it. It is very light weight, compact with good  grip for him. Mainly bought it because he enjoyed his other Lumix but needed a better zoom range which he is very happy with.

Reviews.Title: I returned it, too difficult for me
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Ballard
Reviews.Content: The camera/service were both excellent.  The problem I had with this order was, due to my advanced age, the product was toosmall & detailed for my older hands, decreased vision, and coordination.  Even dealing with the instructions was very difficult for mebecause of memory problems.  I need everything simpilier at my age.  I ordered a product meant for people with better photographic skills and technological savvy.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Brockelsby
Reviews.Content: I wanted better zoom and this camera provided it. The camera is simple to use and I liked the "package" of equipment.
